txt.en: 'My hounds ran off when those terrible goblins scurried through here. They must be so frightened, alone in the woods! Not the goblins, my hounds!\n\n'They will respond to their names if you call to them, I am sure. They are Hrában, Skádda, and Grymil. Please, you must find them and send them home before the goblins come back!'
'Oh thank you, thank you, [placeholder]! My sweet hounds are back home, and now they will be safe from those monsters out there. When I feel all is clear, I will bring them to Vegbár.'
The forester Ainhard's hounds ran into the woods and became lost when the goblins passed through. He has asked for your help tracking them down.
The forester Ainhard lives south of Vegbár.\n\nYou should talk to Ainhard.
Ainhard's three hounds, Hrában, Skádda, and Grymil, can be found somewhere in the forest near his home.\n\nYou should find Hrában, Skádda, and Grymil and send them home.
Grymil takes his time walking home
